title: Traveler's Journey
text: Upon ent'ring the next cubiculo, thee seeth a trip-wire trapeth and seize the opp'rtunity to establisheth thy fake incapabilities. Thee intentionally trigg'r the trip-wire with
one of thy forks and the h'ro shouts and jumps to saveth thee.  In the meantime thee act as thee haven't noticeth aught at all bef'rehand.
